snippet.title: Strange Terror From The Deep | Unreleased/Unfinished Content Update Showcase
snippet.description:
Thought I'd finally get around to recording a, "No Commentary" showcase of STFTD's update that was never finished/released. I totally understand if folks are frustrated that I never finished this and will continue to wanna poke me about it, but I have my reasons why I dropped it. I just wasn't feeling motivated anymore and wanted to move on to other projects. I honestly got really tired of always going back to older games and updating them. I usually only do it if it's something relatively simple, but usually not this big. I guess because the update grew to such a degree that it felt like I was remaking the game, that I just said screw it and stopped working on it.

It's too late now for me to release a mini version of the update with just the font changes and other misc improvements. Too many big changes are still there, like the map rework and only 10% of the characters being rigged and animated. I don't want to go about removing some of these things for the sake of releasing a smaller version of the update, y'know. Anyway, sorry for rambling, enjoy the video!

Get Doomy in the Roomy + more over on my Patreon! ► https://www.patreon.com/DaveMicrowavesGames


My Twitter! ► https://twitter.com/The_Toonimator


My Website! ► https://davemicrowavesgames.wixsite.com/davemicrowavesgames


My Merch! ► https://teespring.com/stores/the-microwave-merch-shop


#DaveMicrowavesGames #StrangeTerrorFromTheDeep #STFTD
